title: Dance Studio II: Advanced Contemporary Forms and Practices
description: Continued study of contemporary dance theory and practice. Focus on intermediate dance technique, individual and group movement invention, choreographic voice, and theatrical applications.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): THEA 31C or permission of instructor.

class_notes: Winter 2024 topic: Intermediate-level practice course in the Afro-Latin social dances Samba and Salsa. Questions may be addressed to the instructor: Marina Magalhaes,mmagalhe@ucsc.edu.
